page.title: 16NEWSPAPER REPORT 11.7.1985
page.content: {ANGER OVER COUNTY JOBS "HELL" Workington M.P.Dale Campbell-Savours} has claimed that whole industrial estates have been laid bare in West Cumbria.In a scathing attack on the Government,he claimed: "All round my constituency there are factories that have been emptied over the last 5 years. Industrialists have over these last 5 years in the Northern Region, and particularly in Workington,had what can only be described as a hell of a time". Council Labour Group leader Hugh Little said: "Unemployment has increased and job opportunities have decreased. Unemployment is as near to 20 per cent as makes no difference in Workington ."
